text: Egh Livain anabamɨn tav uan dɨpenim amadagh, egh uam a givezan aghuaghtɨ, gumazir dɨpenir kam givezezim, azenir biziba ua da ikarvaghamimɨn, a ua dɨpenim isɨ Livain gumazir kam danɨngigh. Guizbangɨra, kɨ Israelian anabar igharaziba bagha nguazibagh inamigha me ganɨngi. Ezɨ Livain anabam puvatɨ. Kɨ Israelian anabar igharazibar nguazibar tongɨn, nguibar ekiar maba isa Livaibagh anɨngi. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, dɨpenir Livain nguibar ekiamɨn itiba, da dughiabar zurara Livain dɨpenibara.
